item.title: Monarch Tractor CEO says $133M raise will help it escape “quite a challenging time”
item.description:
Monarch Tractor was in a tricky spot late last year as the autonomous electric tractor startup juggled growth and an uncertain fundraising environment. Now, with $133 million in new funds, CEO Parveen Penmesta tells TechCrunch that the startup is plowing ahead into greener pastures.  The $133 million Series C funding round was co-led by agri-food […]

item.title: Can a breathtaking convertible concept restore Cadillac to greatness? Time’s running out.
